testcase.name: User register with valid data
testcase.system-out: Given user navigates to registration page...................................passed When user choose gender "male" , enter firstname "Mohammed" and enter lastname "Rajab".passed And user enter date of birth day "2" month "10" year "1999".................passed And user enter email "moRajab@gmail.com" , password "Asdfgh" and confirm with "Asdfgh".passed And click on register button................................................passed Then user is registered successfully message appears........................passed
